data.text:
PONY EXPRESS Motorized Ergo Handling Whether the job calls for pulling, pushing or lifting a heavy load, an investment in a PONY EXPRESS product assures that you are implementing an ergonomic solution for transport. With payload capacities up to 2000 lbs. (910 kgs), our products help you get the job done, SAFELY. Estimated Cost of musculoskeletal Disorders (MSDs) in the United States material handling industry (2008) • 26,720 MSD Claims • $24,438 per Claim • $653 million in Claims Reduce employee injuries from strain and fatigue Safely transport materials across various surfaces and inclines Improve your ergonomic footprint Boost employee moral and productivity Increase your bottom line proﬁtability W194 N11301 McCormick Drive, Germantown, Wisconsin 53022 • Phone: 262-250-7740 sales@ek-tech.com • www.ek-tech.com

Open the catalog to page 1

PONY EXPRESS Motorized Ergo Handling Rugged Spring-Suspension System with Center Wheel Drive Totally Enclosed Maintenancefree Transaxle Drive System Proportional Speed Control with two Speed Ranges Mail Room Rack and Basket Assembly } SPECIFICATIONS • Spring-suspension and center wheel transaxle drive system • Maintenance free permanent magnet motor The 1031 PONY EXPRESS motorized cart provides maximum maneuverability with the highest payload speciﬁcations within the family of products. Unique to the 1031 is the spring-suspension and center wheel transaxle drive system. This system extends...

Many clients have special requirements that require an Ergo Handling solution that is tailored to their needs. Over the years our engineers have worked with clients to provide innovative, cost effective, custom solutions. Some of the areas where we have developed solutions include: Endoscopy • Dialysis • Foundry • Telecom • Pharmaceutical • Tool Room Mail Room • Laundry • Food & Beverage • Aerospace • Automotive...
